title: Manchester City honour Ricky Hatton, ‘one of our most loved supporters’
description: Manchester City held a minute’s appreciation for Ricky Hatton before the derby against United on Sunday after the world champion boxer’s death
content: Manchester City paid tribute to “one of their most loved supporters” when they held a minute’s appreciation on Sunday before the derby against Manchester United to honour Ricky Hatton after his death – with the City manager, Pep Guardiola, saying the... [2139 chars]

title: UK and US unveil nuclear energy deal ahead of Trump visit
description: Key among the plans is a proposal to build up to 12 advanced modular nuclear reactors in Hartlepool.
content:
The UK and US are set to sign an agreement aimed at accelerating the development of nuclear power.
The move aims to generate thousands of jobs and strengthen Britain's energy security.
It is expected to be signed off during US President Donald Trump'... [2351 chars]

title: Nuclear energy plan unveiled by UK and US, promising thousands of jobs

title: Prime suspect in Madeleine McCann case refuses to speak to British police
description: Christian B is expected to be released from a German prison this week after being jailed for raping an elderly woman - and British police had hoped he might finally address the toddler's disappearance.
content:
The prime suspect in the disappearance of Madeleine McCann has refused to be interviewed by the Metropolitan Police.
German drifter Christian B, as he is known under privacy laws, became a leading person of interest following the three-year-old Briti... [2375 chars]
